page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: There are many different hobbies for children to do after school.Mark has many interests,his main hobbies are {train spotting,}riding his bike and going to clubs.He goes to Avenham Park or Preston Train Station to train spot and he takes down train numbers and trains. On Monday nights he goes to 3rd {Leyland Cub Pack.}He is a sixer in the yellow pack.They play games and do things to earn badges.Mark plays football for the cub's team. Michelle's hobbies are{horse riding, playing the{cello}and{reading}.She goes horse riding every Friday night at Longton school.Her favourite horse is Dipper.She has cello lessons in school on Mondays and practices every night for ten minutes.
